overview:
studied Business Administration and Information Management at the University of Witten/Herdecke and the University of Texas, Austin (as scholar of the Association of German-American Clubs and holder of a Fulbright scholarship). He was awarded the Bertram award for business administration and won the Entrepreneurship-essay-competition of the Kassel University.

As a Diplom-Betriebswirt (BA) he was employed by Deutsche Bank in the corporate customer and asset management business.

All in all, he participated in more than 100 successful transactions. Mark Miller is Chairman of the Advisory Board of Triportech GmbH, Hytrac GmbH and e-senza GmbH.
